# Button

Documentation coming soon.

## Usage

```jsx live
import { Button } from "@wp-g2/components"

function Example() {
  return <Button variant="secondary">Let It Go</Button>
}
```

## Props

<!-- props -->
<!-- Automatically Generated -->

| Name            | Type                    | Default       | Description                                                                  |
| --------------- | ----------------------- | ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| disabled        | `boolean`               | `false`       | Renders `Button` in a disabled state.                                        |
| elevation       | `number`                | `0`           | Renders `Elevation` styles for the `Button`.                                 |
| elevationActive | `number`                |               | Renders `Elevation` styles for the `Button` when active.                     |
| elevationFocus  | `number`                |               | Renders `Elevation` styles for the `Button` when focused.                    |
| elevationHover  | `number`                |               | Renders `Elevation` styles for the `Button` when hovered.                    |
| gap             | `number`                | `2`           | The amount of space between each child element within `Button`.              |
| hasCaret        | `boolean`               | `false`       | Determines if a caret `Icon` should render within the `Button`               |
| href            | `string`                |               | An HTML anchor link. Transforms the `Button` in a `<a>` element.             |
| icon            | `React.Component`       |               | Renders an `Icon` within the `Button`.                                       |
| iconSize        | `number`                |               | Adjusts the size of the `Icon` within the `Button` (from the `icon` prop).   |
| isBlock         | `boolean`               | `false`       | Determines if `Button` should render as a block element, rather than inline. |
| isControl       | `boolean`               | `false`       | Renders `Button` with control styles, similar to `TextInput` or `Select`.    |
| isDestructive   | `boolean`               | `false`       | Renders destructive variant.                                                 |
| isLoading       | `boolean`               | `false`       | Renders loading, disabling `Button` and renders a `Spinner`.                 |
| isNarrow        | `boolean`               | `false`       | Renders a narrower `Button`.                                                 |
| isRounded       | `boolean`               | `false`       | Renders a rounded `Button`.                                                  |
| isSubtle        | `boolean`               | `false`       | Renders a subtle `Button`.                                                   |
| justify         | `CSS['justifyContent']` | `'center'`    | Determines how inner content is aligned.                                     |
| noWrap          | `boolean`               | `false`       | Determines if inner content should be wrapped.                               |
| prefix          | `React.Component`       |               | Renders prefix content within `Button`.                                      |
| size            | `BaseButtonSize`        | `'medium'`    | Determines the size of `Button`.                                             |
| suffix          | `React.Component`       |               | Renders suffix content within `Button`.                                      |
| textAlign       | `CSS['textAlign']`      | `'center'`    | Modifies the text-align (CSS) styles of `Button` content.                    |
| variant         | `ButtonVariant`         | `'secondary'` | Determines the `Button` variant to render.                                   |
